summary: Completed full system extraction of AI governance framework from HyperXAdvisor to ai-project-governance repository. Created 6 phases: INVENTORY (85+ files documented), CLASSIFICATION (5 categories), UNIFICATION_REPORT (generalization decisions), REPO_STRUCTURE (directory layout), BOOTSTRAP_FLOW (7-phase init), and README (contract). Key deliverables: 14 reusable role definitions, base.cursorrules template, AI_PLANNER_GUARDRAILS.md with 14 absolute prohibitions, init.sh bootstrap script, and governance.config.yaml.template. Framework is now project-agnostic and ready for adoption.
current_status: ai-project-governance repository initialized with complete AI governance framework extraction. 14 files created across 6 phases. Directory structure in place with core/, adapters/, bootstrap/, prompts/, docs/, examples/. Ready for use as a drop-in governance system for any TypeScript/Python project.
